a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Taxes on income vs. taxes on goods and services, 2022
Total taxes on income (individual and corporate) vs. total taxes on goods and services (including VAT and
sales taxes), as a share of GDP.
Taxes on income, profits and capital gains

Taxes on goods and services
(% of GDP)
Data source: UNU-WIDER Government Revenue Dataset (2023)
